title: PTYL - Is Missing (2006)
description:
PTYL - Is Missing (2006)

Name: Omer Eyal 

Profile: PTYL (hebrew: fuse) is an electronic musician from Tel Aviv, Israel, describing his own hell in a world between war and middleclass with radical sound terror. He started in 1998 with his first project PVC. Most of his tracks he is composing with a tracker programm from the first days of Commodore Amiga driven music and creates a world of extreme atmospheres between glam and industrial music. He tends to the ritualistic SM Scene. 

Label: Danse Macabre / Self-released 
Format: CD, Album / File MP3 *Free from artist website.
Country: Israel 
Released: 2008 
Genre: Electronic  
Style: Industrial, Darkwave
